data.name: Albert Innovation
data.detailed_description:
Albert Innovation, a company known for its extraordinary technological innovations, offers you a job. But when you arrive, no one is there to greet you... you realize you are on your own to find the mysterious boss Albert Thompson. Through the deserted premises, interact with special devices developed by former engineers to explore the premises and try to uncover the company's disturbing past. But beware, because you are not alone in this place...

  • Hand-drawn monochrome 3D graphics creating a dark and unique.
  • An immersive audio universe composed by Virgil Marrel
  • Astonishing devices to hold in your hand to progress
  • There is a threat to you and to these places...

The Episode 1 of Albert Innovation will be available for free as a demo, the next ones will be paid afterwards.

-Delirium Den

data.short_description: Albert Innovation is an immersive, narrative linear horror game, where you will attempt to unravel the mysteries of what was once the most brilliant technological innovation company of the olden days. Manipulate machines, run away, and put an end to this nightmare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and upward
  • Processor: i3 and upward
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 660 GTX and upward
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
